name: Fatui Skirmisher - Geochanter Bracer
desc:
A skirmisher with the ability to generate a Geo Shield and defend their allies.
Unlike the elite Mages and Agents, Fatui Skirmishers are soldiers of lesser individual might.
To complete their tasks and reduce losses in men and materiel, their tactics are thus more reliant on teamwork.

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Recruit's Insignia
dropMaterial.desc: An insignia to identify the recruits. Makes one wonder about what the ones joining the Fatui's war machine were thinking.

dropMaterial.name: Sergeant's Insignia
dropMaterial.desc: An insignia with a different shape to distinguish the sergeants from new recruits. Perhaps there are complicated emotions behind it.

dropMaterial.name: Lieutenant's Insignia
dropMaterial.desc: An insignia to identify officers. The Fatui possess a colossal army, so there must be something extraordinary about the ones who achieved this rank within the group.

value.text: Fatui Skirmishers that wield staffs to manipulate Geo energy and summon crystallized shields. They receive some kind of <color=#ffe14b>elemental buff</color> . Perhaps using <color=#ffe14b>an element that reacts with Geo</color> could make quick work of their buff...
